answers.answer: Hello and hope you are doing well.A dialysis replaces the kidney functions. So, a person can lead a normal life while on dialysis. He will have to be cautious and follow up regularly to monitor parameters like potassium and creatinine for dialysis. His hypertension and diabetes too need to be adequately controlled.Hope this helped and do keep us posted.
